name: Russian Fish Pie
author: LenaM
summary: This is a super easy recipe for fish pie. Any fish would do. The recipe calls for any canned fish of your choice, but leftover baked fish is also a good option.
ingredients: 1 (6.5 ounce) can salmon, drained and flaked
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Butter a cast iron skillet or pie plate
Mix sour cream and baking soda together in a large bowl
Add 1 cup plus 3 tablespoons flour, eggs, mayonnaise, and salt
Mix to form a thin batter of pouring consistency
Pour 1/2 the batter into the prepared skillet or pie plate
Mash fish with a fork; spread on top of the batter
Pour in the rest of the batter
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 30 minutes
